properties.description: IMS_Entity Curted Layer for PBI Reports

content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
                 FROM    sys.schemas
                 WHERE   name = 'miPINS' )
     EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [miPINS]');
 GO

 --CREATE VIEW FOR IMS Entity PBI Report

 CREATE OR ALTER VIEW miPINS.vw_mipins_IMS_Entity
 AS

SELECT

	IMSEntityID                                                     AS [entity_id],
	IMSEntityName                                                   AS [entity_name],
	IMSEntityBusinessArea                                           AS [business_area],
	IMSEntityInformationOwner                                       AS [entity_information_owner],
	IMSEntityInformationExpert                                      AS [entity_information_expert],
	IMSEntityType                                                   AS [type],
	IMSEntityStatus                                                 AS [status],
	IMSEntityPriority                                               AS [priority],
	IMSEntityResolution                                             AS [resolution],
	NULL                                                            AS [work_log],
	IMSEntityBusinessCriticality                                    AS [business_criticality],
	IMSEntityDateModified                                           AS [date_modified]

FROM [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[ims_entity_dim]
	

GO
